effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by two stages. User faints.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
